name: BRK Health Solutions
description: Operator of a digital clinic intended to improve the treatment of diabetes. The company's platform provides affordable and accessible healthcare for those living with diabetes and offers comprehensive treatment driven by digital tools such as configuring a messaging plan to monitor patients' glucose and step-by-step consultations provided by health specialists, enabling diabetic patients to receive treatment as and when required.
